subject: RE: [junit] can anybody let me knw Why Junit
msgSnippet: All your questions are answered here: http://junit.sourceforge.net/ I particularly recommend the Test Infected article as a starting place. Todd.
messageBody:
All your questions are answered here:

http://junit.sourceforge.net/

I particularly recommend the "Test Infected" article as a starting
place.


Todd.
